name: RampRunner
description:
Run and climb the ramps to reach the top while trying to avoid huge objects that roll down the slope and try to crush you. Progress through various worlds and levels to win gems and upgrade your skills and make your character faster and more agile.

Tip : don't forget to collect bonus.

Controls

Use keyboard and mouse.

Arrow keys :  to move the player.
Left mouse button : to click on the dash button
